title: Week 2 Matchups + Losing Impressively, Wheel of Shame - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/17
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a Week 2 Win! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of Week 2 matchup breakdowns. Plus, injury updates, a recap of Giants at Washington, and introducing the “Wheel of Shame” in the Fantasy Faceoff segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 17th, 2021.
  
 (03:40) - FootClan Friday
 (04:20) - Thursday Night Recap
 (14:30) - NFL News
 (18:15) - Week 2 Matchups Part Two
 (18:40) - Raiders at Steelers
 (25:50) - Saints at Panthers
 (31:00) - Broncos at Jaguars
 (37:30) - Vikings at Cardinals
 (43:35) - Falcons at Buccaneers
 (46:45) - Cowboys at Chargers
 (49:15) - Titans at Seahawks
 (52:35) - Chiefs at Ravens
 (56:25) - Lions at Packers
 (01:01:50) - Fantasy Faceoff + Wheel of Shame
   
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
